attributes.action: return the Derek Dalton Memorial Clock to rotherham united football club
attributes.background: the clock was made in the memory of derek dalton, a lifelong football fan of rotherham united, recent photographs show that dereks name has been removed and ken booths put in its place. rotherham united fans want the clock returned to the club

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for returning the Derek Dalton Memorial Clock to Rotherham United Football Club.
